html: Assembled—To plead the cause of their idols with me. This—This wonderful work of mine in bringing my people out of captivity. Former things—Such things as shall happen long before the return from the captivity, which yet your blind idols cannot foresee. Witnesses—Who can testify the truth of any such predictions of theirs, that they may be owned for true gods; or if they can produce no evidence of any such thing, let them confess, that what I say is truth, that I only am the true God.
